attributes.action: abolish the subject of William Shakespeare in all schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, would like to ask for your support in getting the subject of William Shakespeare abloished in all school enviroments, we have asked a large sum of pupils from across the country for their opinion on getting the subject of William Shakespear being abloish and a very large majority of them agreed it was a good idea. one pupil stated... "it is the downside of my time at school and i dread the moment that my teacher will start to talk about him."

Please help us make YOUR children happier in school.
